nodes.text: The Mk I NightStalker Infiltration Suit was a lightweight and durable suit of armor manufactured by Bantin Corp for 4,800 credits. Marketed toward law enforcement and intelligence agencies, the NightStalker combined light-absorbing materials, armorweave, gel-insert plates, and sound dampening fabric in order to produce a suit that provided both respectable protection and decent passive stealth capabilities. It was a full-body suit that covered everything but the wearer's eyes, and was typically worn with scanner goggles or other wearable vision-enhancement systems.

The Mk I NightStalker Infiltration Suit was first mentioned in Cyphers and Masks, an adventure supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game, which was released in 2018.
